SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.services

Class CycleService

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.services.CycleService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CycleService extends Object implements Serializable
Service class for managing cycle-related operations.

Provides functionality for cycle creation, retrieval, updating, and filtering. Handles business logic and validation rules.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • createCycle

      public CycleDTO createCycle(CycleDTO cycleDTO)
      Creates a new cycle and initializes appraisals for all active users. Validates that all users have managers before creation.
      Parameters:
      cycleDTO - The DTO containing cycle creation data
      Returns:
      The created cycle DTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If validation fails
      IllegalStateException - If business rules are violated

    • closeCycle

      public CycleDTO closeCycle(Long cycleId)
      Closes a cycle, changing its state to CLOSED and updating all appraisals to CLOSED. Validates that all appraisals are COMPLETED before allowing closure.
      Parameters:
      cycleId - The cycle ID
      Returns:
      The updated cycle DTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If cycle not found
      IllegalStateException - If cycle is already closed or has pending appraisals

    • updateCycle

      public CycleDTO updateCycle(CycleUpdateDTO cycleUpdateDTO)
      Updates an existing cycle with the provided data.
      Parameters:
      cycleUpdateDTO - The DTO containing updated cycle data
      Returns:
      The updated CycleDTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If cycle not found or validation fails
      IllegalStateException - If cycle cannot be modified

    • getCycleById

      public CycleDTO getCycleById(Long id)
      Retrieves a cycle by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The cycle ID
      Returns:
      The cycle DTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If cycle not found

    • getAllCycles

      public Map<String,Object> getAllCycles(Integer offset, Integer limit)
      Retrieves all cycles.
      Returns:
      List of all cycle DTOs

    • getCyclesByState

      public List<CycleDTO> getCyclesByState(CycleState state)
      Retrieves cycles with a specific state.
      Parameters:
      state - The cycle state to filter by
      Returns:
      List of cycle DTOs

    • getCurrentActiveCycle

      public CycleDTO getCurrentActiveCycle()
      Retrieves the current active cycle.
      Returns:
      The current active cycle DTO, or null if none exists

    • getCyclesByAdmin

      public List<CycleDTO> getCyclesByAdmin(Long adminId)
      Retrieves cycles managed by a specific administrator.
      Parameters:
      adminId - The administrator ID
      Returns:
      List of cycle DTOs

    • getUpcomingCycles

      public List<CycleDTO> getUpcomingCycles()
      Retrieves upcoming cycles.
      Returns:
      List of upcoming cycle DTOs

    • getCyclesWithFilters

      public Map<String,Object> getCyclesWithFilters(CycleState state, Long adminId, LocalDate startDateFrom, LocalDate startDateTo, Integer limit, Integer offset)
      Retrieves cycles with advanced filtering options.
      Parameters:
      state - Optional filter by cycle state
      adminId - Optional filter by administrator ID
      startDateFrom - Optional filter for cycles starting after this date
      startDateTo - Optional filter for cycles starting before this date
      limit - Maximum number of results
      offset - Starting position for pagination
      Returns:
      List of filtered cycle DTOs

    • canCloseCycle

      public Map<String,Object> canCloseCycle(Long cycleId)
      Validates if a cycle can be closed by checking if all appraisals are in COMPLETED state.
      Parameters:
      cycleId - The cycle ID to validate
      Returns:
      Map containing validation result and details
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If cycle not found

    • reopenCycle

      public CycleDTO reopenCycle(Long cycleId)
      Reopens a cycle, changing its state to OPEN.
      Parameters:
      cycleId - The cycle ID
      Returns:
      The updated cycle DTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If cycle not found
      IllegalStateException - If cycle cannot be reopened

    • deleteCycle

      public void deleteCycle(Long cycleId)
      Deletes a cycle by its ID if it has not started yet.
      Parameters:
      cycleId - The cycle ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If cycle not found
      IllegalStateException - If cycle cannot be deleted

    • closeExpiredCycles

      public int closeExpiredCycles()
      Automatically closes all expired cycles (end date in the past).
      Returns:
      The number of cycles that were closed

    • createEmptyAppraisal

      private AppraisalEntity createEmptyAppraisal(UserEntity appraisedUser, UserEntity appraisingUser, CycleEntity cycle)
      Creates a single empty appraisal entity.
      Parameters:
      appraisedUser - The user being appraised
      appraisingUser - The manager doing the appraisal
      cycle - The cycle this appraisal belongs to
      Returns:
      The created appraisal entity

    • createAppraisalsForCycle

      private void createAppraisalsForCycle(CycleEntity cycle)
      Creates empty appraisals for all active users in the given cycle. Each user receives an appraisal from their assigned manager.
      Parameters:
      cycle - The cycle for which to create appraisals
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If any user has no manager

    • countAllCycles

      public long countAllCycles()

    • countCyclesByState

      public long countCyclesByState(CycleState state)
